Name: The Billion Clicker
About the game: The Billion Clicker is a pure idle clicker game with simple mechanics but truly addictive gameplay. Your goal is to reach one billion value. That's it! Sounds easy, right? But the challenge is that you start from the 0.000000001 value. Analyze your actions and upgrades you want to purchase. Use prestige system wisely. And once you will be able to reach the final goal! Benefits: Addictive gameplay with idle and clicker mechanics Five stats to upgrade. Nothing unnecessary Prestige system. Reset your progress to reach new heights Stylish minimalistic graphics. Dark and light themes included Track your progress. Want to know how many clicks left to complete the game? Achievable goals. The game can be completed, just find the way If you are tired of idle game overloaded with useless mechanics and infinite goals then The Billion Clicker is your choice. Just try.
